Html:
Hello,

 

I'm trying to do a specific zoom using a double value using windows forms with last version.

However, when I do it, the overlays disappear and the grid of the tiles are shown.

 

Is it working properly using double?

 

Thank you.
i didn't test it for latest versions, but i'll check. Can i ask you what slider do you use to get float values?

Hi Radioman,

 

I use this code:

 

          map.zoom = (0 + ((trackBar1.Value - trackBar1.Maximum) / ((trackBar1.Minimum - trackBar1.Maximum) / (17.0 - 2))));

 

This is the result:

https://picasaweb.google.com/lh/photo/DbWSB7ZuXHBbws0pL0KGiQ?feat=directlink

 

 

Thank you.
